DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect aquatic exercise participant Lymphedema .
DOC.brief_title: Aquatic Exercise Study Breast Cancer Patients With Lymphedema
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study examine effectiveness aquatic exercise reduce Lymphedema . The study design breast cancer patient develop Lymphedema follow cancer treatment . Potential study participant explore conventional treatment decongestive therapy lymph drainage massage join study . There two group participant may choose enrollment group reach capacity.The active arm study attend 12 one-hour aquatic exercise class class hold indoor heat pool . There cost participants.Both active arm control group ( attend aquatic exercise class ) 3 measurement assessment compare circumference volumetric measurement arm , well height , weight body mass index ( BMI ) . Both group fill program questionnaire . Quality life survey take baseline , week 6 , month 6 12 compare . A follow questionnaire complete 6 12 month interval , annually five year .
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer patient Lymphedema Patients must receive standard Lymphedema treatment ( Complete Decongestive Therapy ) prior participate study . Patients undergoing treatment require write permission physician Complete assessment license physical therapist begin exercise program Patients must sign consent form participate Patients undergoing treatment without physician 's write permission Patients health problem contraindicate exercise Patients eligible physical therapy assessment identifies contraindication participation Inclusion Women Minorities : Men , woman minority breast cancer relate lymphedema eligible
